review: Good golly Miss Molly!  I am so pleased with the Amazon Fire TV.  I did sign up for Netflix and have Prime and there are so many choices.  I thought about ordering since the day it came out, but kept wondering if I should do it.  I finally did and it is so worth it.  I got an antenna today for local channels and am canceling my cable tv tomorrow.  Hook up was pretty easy for me, so anyone can do it.  This is going to save me over $1,000 a year.  LOVE FIRE TV!Update:  So after having Fire TV for a little over a week, last night the Fire TV, which is suppose to go to sleep after 30 minutes of no activity, stayed on for 3+ hours, until I finally decided to unplug it.  I am not comfortable having my internet running non-stop.  So I will plug it in when I get home from work and see if that happens again this evening.  I did find an online forum about this, so it appears to be a problem.  One person got a huge bill from his internet provider for using too much.  I will post an update shortly.
